document.docAuthor: Haddad, Charles R., Lyle, Robin, Bosselaers, Jan & Ramirez, Martin J.
document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the endemic South African spider genus Austrachelas, with its transfer to the Gallieniellidae (Arachnida: Araneae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revision of the endemic South African spider genus Austrachelas, with its transfer to the Gallieniellidae (Arachnida: Araneae)

bibRefCitation.author: Lawrence
bibRefCitation.refString: Lawrence, R. F. (1942) A contribution to the araneid fauna of Natal and Zululand. Annals of the Natal Museum, 10, 141 - 190.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 60–67. Genitalic morphology of
Austrachelas
species. (60–63)
A. merwei
n. sp.
: female epigyne, ventral view (60), dorsal view (61), male palp, ventral view (62), retrolateral view (63); (64–67)
A. natalensis Lawrence, 1942
: female epigyne, ventral view (64), dorsal view (65), male palp, ventral view (66), retrolateral view (67). Scale bars = 0.1mm.
